name: .VMAT_C
summary: Learn about .VMAT_C files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can use the Valve Source 2 Viewer (Windows) to decompile a VMAT_C file into a VMAT file. Then, you can open your VMAT file in the Valve Source 2 Material Editor (Windows, Mac), which is included in the Dota 2 Workshop Tools and Half-Life: Alyx Workshop Tools utility packages.
